column4: greetings all, I am new to ubuntu.  How do I unzip and install a program I downloaded, tried some tutorials I found around the web with no luck. the file is a tar.gz thanks
in a terminal cd to the file then tar -xzvf "file name"
tried to cd acidrip-0.14.tar.gz  which is the file, I get no such directory
you cd to the directory its in
